pageDescription: Manage your restaurant's basic information, global currency, and media URLs. These settings are saved on the server and used globally.
restaurantInfoDescription: Update your restaurant's name, address, contact details, and legal numbers.
restaurantNameDescription: This name will be used as the website title and for branding.
autoLogoutDescription: Duration of inactivity before auto-logout. Set to 0 to disable.
displayLangSettingsDescription: Set the currency and language used for displaying information throughout the application.
baseCurrencyInfoText: All menu item prices are entered and stored in {baseCurrency}. The currency selected here is for display, converted using rates from "Currency Rates" settings.
globalDisplayLanguageInfoText: This setting primarily affects static labels on generated invoices. Full application translation is a larger feature.
